network

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    A client of our game, that connects to the main game instance located on a server. Sends updates to the server when the client does something and receives updates when the local game requires changing.
    Author:
    Matt Byers

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Client.ServerThread
      ServerThread that continuously looks for updates from the Server

    • Constructor Detail

      • Client

        public Client(java.lang.String host,
              java.lang.String user,
              ApplicationWindow gui)
        Constructs a new client that will in turn create and connect a socket to the server socket at the specified host address. The Client thread will also be started to wait for updates from the server.
        Parameters:
        host - - The String address of the host to connect to, if empty the socket wont connect.
        user - - The user name of the client, this is checked by ApplicationWindow
        gui - - The ApplicationWindow that will display the clients gui.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the client socket. Creates the input/output streams Writes the first object to the output(the username of this client).

      • registerKeyPress

        public void registerKeyPress(java.awt.event.KeyEvent event)
        Creates a NetworkEvent storing a KeyEvent and writes it to the output.
        Parameters:
        event- - The KeyEvent of the key pressed.

      • registerMessage

        public void registerMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Creates a NetworkEvent storing a message string and writes it to the output.
        Parameters:
        message - - The message written.

      • cycleAnimations

        public void cycleAnimations()
        Creates a NetworkEvent storing no extra info and writes it, tells the server that a client needs an animation cycle.

      • swapItems

        public void swapItems(int index1,
                      int index2)
        Creates a NetworkEvent storing two indexes and writes it, telling the server to swap these items in this clients inventory
        Parameters:
        index1 - - Start index
        index2 - - End index

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem(int index)
        Creates a NetworkEvent storing one index and writes it, telling the server to remove the item at the index in the players inventory.
        Parameters:
        index - - Index of item to be removed.

      • addItem

        public void addItem(Item item)
        Creates a NetworkEvent storing an item and writes it, tells the server to add this item to this players inventory.
        Parameters:
        item - - Item to be added.

      • setWeapon

        public void setWeapon(Item item)
        Creates a NetworkEvent Storing a weapon item and writes it, tells the server to equip this item on the player.
        Parameters:
        item - - The weapon to be equipped.

      • setArmour

        public void setArmour(Item item)
        Creates a NetworkEvent Storing an armour item and writes it, tells the server to equip this item on the player.
        Parameters:
        item - - The weapon to be equipped.

      • removeItemContainer

        public void removeItemContainer(int index,
                                Container container)
        Creates a NetworkEvent storing an index and a container and writes it, tells the server to remove said indexes item from the container specified.
        Parameters:
        index - - The index of the item to be removed.
        container - - The container to remove it from.

      • useItem

        public void useItem(Item item)
        Creates a NetworkEvent storing an item and writes it, telling the server to use the item on this player.
        Parameters:
        item - - The item to be used.

      • dropItem

        public void dropItem(int index)
        Creates a NetworkEvent storing an index and writes it, telling the server to drop the item at the index from this players inventory.
        Parameters:
        index - - The index of the item to be dropped.

      • addItemContainer

        public void addItemContainer(Item item,
                             Container container)
        Creates a NetworkEvent storing an item and a container and writes it, telling the server to add the item to the container.
        Parameters:
        item - - Item to be added.
        container - - Container to add the item to.

      • close

        public void close()
        Stops the ServerThread. Creates a NetworkEvent storing no information and writes it, telling the server to close the connection to this client. Closes input and output to the server. Closes this socket.

      • getState

        public Player getState()
